content: **this is a pay what you want pattern use the code fashionista50 for 50% off the original price or use the code fashionista100 for a free copy thank you for your support introducing the fashionista scrunchie a quick and easy crochet pattern that adds a touch of elegance to your hair accessories with its simple design and chic finish this scrunchie is perfect for those who want to elevate their look without spending hours crafting whether you re dressing up for a special occasion or adding a stylish flair to your everyday wear the fashionista scrunchie brings a sophisticated yet effortless charm perfect for beginners and seasoned crocheters alike this pattern will have you creating beautiful scrunchies in no time this pattern is made with worsted or aran weight yarn and a 5 5mm hook gauge is not crucial in this pattern it includes two sizes one for thick hair l and one for medium hair s the distinction in the sizes are made in the different hair band sizes for the l size you will want to pick up hair bands specifically made for thick hair and for the s size you will pick up hair bands specifically for medium hair the sizes will be displayed like this…s l there is a section in my pattern called possibilities where you can explore all the options of this scrunchie definitely check that out before starting all my samples except the pink one stop after round 2 but i encourage you to experiment and see what works for you the pink one has the picot edging which is included in the pattern this is a beginner friendly pattern it includes a photo tutorial at the end of the written instructions and uses basic stitches thank you for choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed it you may sell as many of the finished items as you wish but if you share on social media please give me credit @stopitharry on ravelry and link the pattern to its source if you have any questions or need pattern support please contact me @stopitharry on ravelry i appreciate your support
